message: The retrieval of challenges was successful.

**Author**: wwm
data.author: wwm

data.name: barcade
data.description:
Look at this ITG cabinet---it's even running the **latest itgmania version**,
1.1.0. **Custom songs are enabled too!** Oh, but this barcade charges $2
for just one stage... my favorite chart doesn't even appear in song selection
because it's too long. Can you **put the machine into Event Mode** so I can
play it?

expected difficulty: 3/5

[https://instancer.sekai.team/challenges/barcade](https://instancer.sekai.team/challenges/barcade)

**Author**: BrownieInMotion

data.name: sanity-check

Note: Flag is **case-sensitive** and it can be properly figured out by opening the map in-game.

expected difficulty: 1/5

**Author**: wwm
data.author: wwm

data.name: cached
data.description:
Something is not quite right if you look at the beatmap page... Did I forget to clean my footprint?

Note: This challenge ONLY requires you to inspect the mapset page (i.e. any stuff under https://osu.ppy.sh/beatmapsets/x/...). Do NOT interact with forum or post anything outside.

This is an OSINT challenge.

expected difficulty: 2/5



**Author**: sahuang
data.author: sahuang

data.name: oddly-easy
data.description:
The EASY diff looks so easy, surely it's not hiding anything?

Wrap the flag in `osu{}`. All lowercase.

Note: Flag length (without `osu{}`) is 10.

expected difficulty: 3/5



**Author**: sahuang
data.author: sahuang

data.name: welcome
data.description:
Welcome to osu!gaming CTF 2025 (Rhythm Game Edition). Please join our [Discord](https://discord.com/invite/pJ5VpFKduN) for challenge updates and admin support.

Have fun!



**Author**: osu!gang
data.author: osu!gang

data.name: dmca
data.description:
Peppy once received a DMCA takedown request for osu! due to alleged copyright infringement. The client, however, spelled "osu!" wrong.

Can you find out the email address of the client who sent the DMCA request? Wrap in `osu{}` and submit.

expected difficulty: 1/5



**Author**: sahuang
data.author: sahuang

data.name: miss-analyzer-v2
data.description:
miss-analyzer from last year was a bit buggy :((

I changed some things to make it more secure, surely it's fine now, right?

expected difficulty: 3/5

`nc miss-analyzer-v2.challs.sekai.team 1337`

**Author**: strellic
data.author: strellic

data.name: files
data.description:
My filesystem got corrupted somehow... can you find the odd one out? The flag is the file name that doesn't belong, wrapped in osu{}.

expected difficulty: 1/5



**Author**: Quintec
data.author: Quintec

data.name: modulation-master
data.description:
Have you heard of digital modulation?

[I was forced to make this challenge.](https://discord.com/channels/1203588695886921728/1382021272002760816/1430555595383115829)

[https://instancer.sekai.team/challenges/modulation-master](https://instancer.sekai.team/challenges/modulation-master)

**Author**: sahuang
data.author: sahuang

data.name: lobby
data.description:
[Multi](https://osu.ppy.sh/wiki/en/Client/Interface/Multiplayer) is a game mode in osu! that allows players to play together in a multiplayer lobby. PvP is fun, isn't it?

Join the official CTF lobby **osu!gaming CTF 2025** to claim the flag! You are more than welcomed to stay in the lobby for a bit longer and have fun with others. **There WILL be a secret prize for a random game winner :wysi:**

Please behave nicely and follow the rules. Do not spoil the fun for others! Report any misbehaviour to admins.

Note: Please copy the flag string from website/chat log to avoid misspell.



**Author**: osu!gang
data.author: osu!gang

data.name: bleh
data.description:
bleh :p

Charset: `[a-f0-9]+`. Concatenate all inputs, then decode as hex.

expected difficulty: 2/5

**Author**: strellic
data.author: strellic

data.name: date-a-live
data.description:
My friend is a huge fan of the Date A Live series, and promised me to make a good mapset of the songs. Maybe he isn't a good mapper, though.

Wrap the secret you got to `osu{...}` format. Note: Flag length (without `osu{}`) is 10.

expected difficulty: 3/5



**Author**: sahuang
data.author: sahuang

data.name: beatmap-list
data.description:
we heard the admin has a secret osu! beatmap...

can you find it?

HINT: flag format is `osu{[a-z_]+}`

expected difficulty: 4/5

[https://beatmap-list-web.challs.sekai.team](https://beatmap-list-web.challs.sekai.team)

[Admin Bot](https://admin-bot.sekai.team/beatmap-list)

**Author**: Quintec
data.author: Quintec

data.name: lunatic-ksm
data.description:
There's a reason why the term "illegal pattern" exists.

[発狂KSM os/us難易度表 (v5.0)](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13KWwfk0_gyNdVad-8Bhy7F1r2mYRSykh9vC0qx6fSkM/edit?usp=sharing)

Make sure to submit flag content in uppercase, like this: `osu{HELLO_WORLD}`

expected difficulty: 1/5



**Author**: enscribe
data.author: enscribe

data.name: pulsus
data.description:
Check out [Pulsus](https://pulsus.cc/play/), a rhythm game for PC in which you hit incoming beats on a 3x3 tile board! There's a flag in my account, can you find it?

Note: no account signup needed. Please do not try to perform malicious actions on the site, no brute-force tools are necessary and will ban you.

expected difficulty: 1/5

**Author**: osu!gang
data.author: osu!gang

data.name: hidden-signal
data.description:
Someone showed me a "map" and he claimed to have found a hidden signal in it. Can you decode it?

Turn the answer to uppercase and wrap it in `osu{FLAG}` format.

Note: A 0 is missing in the string before decoding the flag. It is in the last third of the flag and you could notice it when you get to the part. It should be easily guessable where to add the 0. Sorry for the confusion.

expected difficulty: 3/5

**Author**: es3n1n
data.author: es3n1n

data.name: osu-css
data.description:
We were fed up with cheaters, so we decided to rewrite osu! in a programming language that has no cheats.

Note: Please use Chrome or Firefox for this challenge.

expected difficulty: 2/5



**Author**: rebane2001
data.author: rebane2001

data.name: beyond-wood
data.description:
spinning white floating glowing man in forest

expected difficulty: 1/5



**Author**: wwm
data.author: wwm

data.name: map-dealer
data.description:
We have confiscated a USB drive from sahuang, whom we were informed was trying to sell a beatmap containing some confidential data of the community to the dark web. However, the beatmap was nowhere to be found from the drive when we mounted it to our computer. Can you help recover it?

expected difficulty: 3/5



**Author**: hollow
data.author: hollow

data.name: circles
data.description:
Both osu! and this game consist of circles... And the latest version of the game is also named CiRCLE...

Anyway, we found out an evil group is trying to encode some secret message in their usernames.

The only info we get is the image below, please help us!

P.S. The flag contains non-ascii characters, and you should wrap it in `osu{FLAG}` format.

P.P.S. You don't have to touch grass in order to solve this challenge :)

![image.png](https://osuctf25-challenges.storage.googleapis.com/uploads/90c3e229b8793a8dac4d403d2c9f65a940d53943/image.png)

expected difficulty: 2/5



**Author**: hoifanrd
data.author: hoifanrd

data.name: pump-lion
data.description:
PumpLion, the cheerful lion mascot of osu!gaming CTF, has been deployed as a "super-secure" chatbot for event participants. Rumor has it... the flag is hidden deep in its silicon jungle. But don't expect it to just hand it to you on a silver platter - it's been "prompt-trained" to protect it at all costs.

Note: rate limiting is enforced, do not spam the LLM.

expected difficulty: 2/5

[https://pump-lion-web.challs.sekai.team](https://pump-lion-web.challs.sekai.team)

**Author**: sahuang
data.author: sahuang

data.name: imagemap-generator
data.description:
making imagemaps is too hard...

so i built a program to make it easier!

expected difficulty: 2/5

`nc imagemap-generator.challs.sekai.team 1337`

**Author**: strellic
data.author: strellic

data.name: rankeratorinator
data.description:
The year is 2077, and the Automated Beatmap Evaluation System (A.B.E.S.) now controls all osu! rankings, enforcing a flawless standard no human can meet. To achieve a coveted RANKED status, you can't just fix an existing map, you must craft a brand new beatmap from scratch that meets A.B.E.S.'s impossible criteria. Successfully ranking a map under this automated system grants the mapper a key to the elusive Mapper's Guild High Society.

Please test locally before submitting, the server is running on Python 3.12.

expected difficulty: 5/5

`nc rankeratorinator.challs.sekai.team 1337`

**Author**: sahuang
data.author: sahuang

data.name: tosu-1
data.description:
Welcome to the first part of the series of tosu challenges.

Full clear the attached map scoring only 300s.

Note: If your solver isn't working and you're confident that it seems correct but still can't get the flag, try achieving the perfect score with no reflection of it in the GUI.
Essentially, you should have a perfect score without ever touching the circles, and the counts on the final screen should all be zero except the miss count, which should be 1080. (It will make sense if you're stuck in that place)

expected difficulty: 3/5
